sentences.en: a board meeting
sentences.cn: 董事会会议

sentences.en: a board member
sentences.cn: 董事会成员

sentences.en: a chess board
sentences.cn: 棋盘

sentences.en: Colonel Richard Nelson served on the school board until this year.
sentences.cn: 理查德·纳尔逊上校直到今年才从地方教育董事会离职。

sentences.en: Dr Tinsley had five pieces on the board against Chinook's four.
sentences.cn: 廷斯利博士在棋盘上还有5枚棋子，对手钦诺克还有4枚。

sentences.en: Free room and board are provided for all hotel staff.
sentences.cn: 宾馆的所有员工都可享受免费膳宿。

sentences.en: He wrote a few more notes on the board.
sentences.cn: 他在黑板上又写了几条注释。

sentences.en: I’ll check the departure board for train times.
sentences.cn: 我去查一下开车时刻表，看看火车的时间。

sentences.en: Make sure the draining board, sink and plug hole are regularly disinfected.
sentences.cn: 滴水板、水槽和塞孔一定要定期消毒。

sentences.en: Martha was chopping vegetables on a wooden board.
sentences.cn: 玛莎正在用一块木砧板切蔬菜。

sentences.en: my education just went by the board.
sentences.cn: 我的教育荒废了。

sentences.en: Passengers were standing on the dock, waiting to board.
sentences.cn: 乘客们站在码头上等待上船。

sentences.en: Several students boarded with Mrs. Smith.
sentences.cn: 有几名学生寄宿在史密斯夫人家里。

sentences.en: She always had one or two students boarding with her.
sentences.cn: 她的家总有一两名寄宿学生。

sentences.en: She watches him plane the surface of a walnut board.
sentences.cn: 她看着他刨平一块胡桃木板。

sentences.en: The Board had been slow to render its verdict.
sentences.cn: 董事会迟迟未能作出决定。

sentences.en: The Board is scrupulous in its consideration of all applications for licences.
sentences.cn: 委员会对所有申请许可证的人予以审慎考虑。

sentences.en: The Board of Directors has approved the decision unanimously.
sentences.cn: 董事会成员一致批准了该项决定。

sentences.en: The board reversed its decision and asked Mr. Evans to stay on.
sentences.cn: 委员会改变了决定，请求埃文斯先生留下。

sentences.en: The couple boarded the train for New York.
sentences.cn: 夫妻俩登上了开往纽约的列车。

sentences.en: The Internet is the largest computer bulletin board in the world.
sentences.cn: 因特网是世界上最大的计算机公告系统。

sentences.en: The medical board would not pass him fit for General Service.
sentences.cn: 医疗卫生委员会不会批准他为全科医生。

sentences.en: The six astronauts on board will spend ten days in space.
sentences.cn: 飞船上的6名宇航员将在太空度过10天。

sentences.en: There are hefty charges across the board for one-way rental.
sentences.cn: 各处对单程租赁的收费都很高。

sentences.en: You get a big salary incentive and free board and lodging too.
sentences.cn: 你们能获得大笔激励性薪水，还可享受免费膳宿。

words.tran_cn: 寄膳者；寄膳宿者；寄宿生
用木板遮住；收费为…供膳（board的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 全面地；包括一切地；以三等分的钱数赌同一匹马赢得前三名
监事会；（美）中西部及东部各州的县议会
n. 董事长；董事局主席
（计划或坚持的事情）被放弃，荒废，被拒绝
在董事会，将在会上讨论；在那块木板上

trans.tran_cn: （木）板，棋盘，董事会，（用于机构名称中）委员会，伙食
trans.tran_en: a flat piece of wood, plastic, card etc that you use for a particular purpose such as cutting things on, or for playing indoor games
to get on a bus, plane, train etc in order to travel somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 登机， 上船； 搭伙， 膳宿
trans.tran_en: to get on a bus, plane, train etc in order to travel somewhere
to get on a bus, plane, train etc in order to travel somewhere
